actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

official_title: To prohibit discrimination by the States on the basis of nonresidency in the licensing of dental health care professionals, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits a State from discriminating against a dental health care professional on the basis that such individual is a resident of another State or was first licensed to perform dental services in another State when considering such individual's application for a license to perform such services. Authorizes aggrieved individuals and the Attorney General to bring civil actions against States violating such prohibition.

titles.title: To prohibit discrimination by the States on the basis of nonresidency in the licensing of dental health care professionals, and for other purposes.
